parameters.formDescription: Drop in a YouTube video URL

parameters.content:
# ðŸ“˜ n8n Cheat Sheet: 17 Nodes to Master  
**Author:** [Nate Herk](https://www.youtube.com/@nateherk)

These are the essential n8n nodes to master for building powerful workflows. Use this as a reference or training guide to level up your automation game.

### ðŸ§  Core Nodes to Learn

1. **Schedule Trigger** â€“ Automate workflows on a timer or interval.
2. **Event Triggers** â€“ Start workflows from external events.
3. **Subworkflows** â€“ Modularize logic into reusable flows.
4. **Split Out** â€“ Break apart arrays for item-by-item processing.
5. **Aggregate** â€“ Combine items together for summaries or grouped output.
6. **Edit Fields (Set Node)** â€“ Modify, rename, or add data fields.
7. **IF Node** â€“ Create conditional logic branches.
8. **Switch Node** â€“ Route logic based on multiple cases.
9. **Code Node** â€“ Use JavaScript for custom logic.
10. **HTTP Request** â€“ Connect with APIs and external services.
11. **Loop** â€“ Iterate over operations or until a condition is met.
12. **Webhook** â€“ Receive incoming data to trigger workflows.
13. **Response** â€“ Send a reply back to webhook callers.
14. **AI Agent** â€“ Use an LLM agent to intelligently process steps.
15. **AI Tools** â€“ Tools for text generation, classification, summarization.
16. **Structured Output Parser** â€“ Parse JSON or formatted LLM output.
17. **Google Sheets** â€“ Read/write spreadsheet data in real-time.

ðŸ’¡ **Tip:** Try building a practice workflow using just these nodes to reinforce your skills!
